title: The Debunker Bunker
itunes:title: The Debunker Bunker
description:
A room filled with heroes -- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and Marc Sessler – examine the latest NFL news including Odell Beckham Jr’s comments on Josh Norman and the retirement announcements of Eugene Monroe and Charles “Peanut” Tillman. Then, the heroes discuss Russell Wilson’s “Barbershop Talk” before debuting a new segment called “Debunker Bunker" where they disprove conventional wisdom in the NFL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
